name: Mudra of the Malefic General
description: A puppet joint obtained from the Plane of Euthymia. The gesture heresymbolizes the concept that "one sees and one does."  Even now that "she" has become a calamitous deity, she can still utilize suchtranscendent gestures, her sword flashing forth as swiftly as her eyes maysee.  And yet, as the countless disasters ground on for far too long, the balefulgeneral's shell had to embrace a new spring.
